commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hello, Shioriko? It's Ayumu. Do you have some time to talk?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Uehara, good evening. What is it?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Is this about your practice schedule again? I thought I explained to you before that I'm no expert, so my advice is bound to be off-base...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, no, I didn't call to ask about that. Well, I do want to discuss the practice schedule with you, but not right now. Um... Well...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see... So you're calling to discuss a certain someone.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What? How did you know?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Uehara... You really do lack a little self-awareness. Whenever you want to discuss something that isn't school idols, it always has to do with that person.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Do... Do I really talk about her that much?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes. I know you two are close childhood friends.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* ...This is so embarrassing.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: So what are you calling to discuss? If you want to ask her out somewhere, it's better to just be straight about it than keep hinting.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: N-No, that's not it!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I'm just joking. You're fun to tease.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What? Shioriko, you actually joke around?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I am capable of it, yes. However, I did perhaps tease you too much. I'm sorry. Tell me why you called.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Umm... So you know how she works harder than anyone, whether it's the school tour or getting volunteers? Well, actually, she's always doing her best for us in everything.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That's true. She really helped us out during the school tour.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Which is why I wanted to give her a present to thank her for everything that she does.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That's a nice idea. I'm sure she'll love that.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So I was trying to think of what to get her, and I really couldn't decide... So I wanted to ask you to help me think of something. I bet we can give her a gift she'll love.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Well, I really think she'll love anything you give her, but all right. She's helped me out too, so let me assist you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Great! Do you want to go shopping this weekend then? As long as you don't have any volunteer work to do, of course.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I'm free on Saturday. Is that all right with you?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah! Thank you, Shioriko!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: No problem. I'm grateful that you've given me an opportunity to express my gratitude to her as well. See you Saturday, then.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm looking forward to it!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sorry to make you wait! Were you here long?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: No, not at all. It's still a few minutes before the time we agreed upon.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Still, you were already here.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I mean... I don't meet up with people a lot... I just ended up arriving earlier than expected after hurrying so I wouldn't make you wait. Don't worry about it.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What?! If you got here too early, then send me a message so I can hurry over! Next time you definitely have to do that!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: N-Next time? All right, I understand.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Good! And let me just say again, thank you for agreeing to go shopping with me today.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: You don't need to thank me. I want to do something for her too, to show her how grateful I am.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Um, so after we hung up I racked my brain thinking of what to get, but in the end I just couldn't come up with anything good...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Let's start by just browsing around. I'm sure we'll get a clearer picture as we go.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Y-Yeah, you're right!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Then let's go.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh! Those matching keychains are so cute! But there are only two, so if I gave her one that would look like it was a gift from only me, even though you're helping me today.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: There's caricatures, too. Hey, what do you think of a caricature?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: A caricature...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, and these necklaces are adorable too! Shioriko, what do you think of this one? Oh, but I'd want her to always wear it...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That would be difficult, seeing as how wearing unnecessary accessories and jewelry is against school policy.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You're right... And I'd be sad if it got confiscated, so I guess that's out. Hmm, I really just can't decide!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Giggle*

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: H-Hey, don't laugh at me!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I'm sorry, I couldn't help myself. You really do love her, don't you?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I adore her. We've been together ever since we were kids... And she's my number one source of motivation when it comes to being a school idol.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Your number one source of motivation?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah. She's the one who puts the School Idol Club above all else.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: All of us are really important to her, and when she became club president she promised she'd always be our biggest fan.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So I want to live up to the faith she has in us. I don't want to betray her expectations. That keeps me going no matter how rough a practice gets.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: The two of you certainly share a deep bond.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Giggle* So Shioriko, what kind of present do you think would be good?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Hmm... For a gift that conveys gratitude, I would go with an assortment of fancy seaweed or a luxury towel set. Something like towels definitely wouldn't go to waste.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Giggle* A gift basket of towels? That's kinda old-fashioned.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: W-Well, maybe... Okay, then what about an assortment of vegetable juices to show that we value her health?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* That's still the same type of thing! But I do like getting juice in gift baskets.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: The only thing is that a juice assortment would be heavy and hard to carry...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I am realizing how tough it is to pick out a good present...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Oh, I know! What about a gift of her favorite item?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Favorite item... Oh! Notebooks for her practice notes!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Exactly! Doesn't she always have one with her during your practices?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: She writes really detailed notes about our practices in that notebook. She said it's almost all full, so she could use a new one.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But is a notebook too cheap of a gift?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I don't think the cost matters for something like this. That said, I do understand your concerns.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: How about we have everyone in the club write messages to her on the first page?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ooh! That's a really good idea! Yeah, let's do that!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thank you so much for helping me out today, Shioriko!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I'm just glad I was able to contribute.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thanks to you, we're going to give her the best present ever! I'm really glad I asked you to come.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Now all I have to do is focus on the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We've got all the volunteers we need, we've got your support, so now we just have to work hard. We'll definitely make this a success, so I hope you enjoy it too, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Hmm, yes. I do hope it succeeds.
